attributes.action: Ban gambling on Sundays or restrict the openning hours to 10:00 until 17:00.
attributes.additional_details:
Betting shops are open 7 days a week from 08:30 until 22:00 hours.
Sundays should be kept as a religous day and all gambling should be banned or restricted to 10:00 until 17:00 hours.
Book makers make enough money as it is and creates gambling addicts whose families suffer by losing thier houses and huge amounts of debt.
